aboutParagraph1: Numa is a premium clothing brand created by specialized fashion designers for 6 years. It embodies originality, simplicity, and comfort. Each piece is designed as a work of art with attention to detail and authenticity.
aboutParagraph2: Numa aims to energize Ivorian fashion by bringing unique styles inspired by European and American trends. Our creations stand out for their originality and longevity: our designs never go out of style. The Numa logo, always embroidered, reflects our commitment to quality and elegance.
aboutParagraph3: Founded in Abidjan on December 17, 2025, Numa focuses on e-commerce to facilitate remote shopping. Each item comes with all necessary information to allow customers to make confident choices. We prioritize respectful and attentive communication and offer express delivery for a fast and pleasant experience.
numaInAbidjan: Numa is based in Abidjan, CÃ´te d'Ivoire.
numaAfrica: Based in Abidjan, Numa aims to shine across Africa through its unique creations and efficient e-commerce.
termsIntro: Welcome to the Numa website. By accessing our site or using our services, you agree to comply with these terms of use. If you do not agree, please do not use our site.
termsSection1Text: You agree to use the Numa website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with applicable laws. Any fraudulent, abusive, or illegal use is strictly prohibited.
termsSection2Text: To place an order, you may create an account on our site. You are responsible for the confidentiality of your information and for all activities conducted from your account.
termsSection3Text: All content on the site, including text, images, logos, and designs, is the property of Numa or its partners. Any reproduction or use without permission is prohibited.
termsSection4Text: Orders placed on the site are subject to availability and confirmation. Payment must be made according to the methods offered on the site. Numa reserves the right to cancel any order in case of payment issues.
termsSection5Text: Numa shall not be liable for indirect damages, data loss, or delays related to the use of the site or product delivery, within the limits allowed by law.
termsConclusion: By using the Numa website, you accept these terms and agree to comply with them. Thank you for your trust and loyalty.
contactIntro: For any questions, suggestions, or partnerships, contact our team. We will reply as soon as possible.
contactSuccess: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.q1: How can I place an order on Numa?
faq.a1: You can order directly from our e-commerce website. Select your items, add them to the cart, and follow the payment and delivery steps.
faq.q2: Which payment methods do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept credit cards (Visa, MasterCard), mobile money, and PayPal for a secure and convenient experience.
faq.q3: Do you deliver outside CÃ´te dâ€™Ivoire?
faq.a3: Yes, we deliver throughout Africa and to some European countries. Delivery times and fees vary depending on the destination.
faq.q4: How can I track my order?
faq.a4: After your order is confirmed, you will receive a tracking number to monitor your delivery in real time.
faq.q5: Can I return an item if I am not satisfied?
faq.a5: Yes, you can return an item within 7 days after receipt, provided it is in perfect condition. Please contact our customer service for more information.

delivery.title: Delivery Policy
delivery.intro: At Numa, we are committed to providing you with a pleasant and fast shopping experience. Our delivery services are designed to ensure your items arrive in perfect condition and on time.
delivery.timeCI: Express delivery in CÃ´te dâ€™Ivoire: 24 to 48 hours after order confirmation.
delivery.timeAfrica: Standard delivery in Africa: 3 to 7 business days, depending on the destination country.
delivery.timeInternational: International delivery: 7 to 15 business days, depending on the region and carrier.
delivery.feesText: Delivery fees are calculated automatically during checkout, based on your address and chosen delivery method. We offer options tailored to your needs: express or standard.
delivery.trackingText: After your order is confirmed, you will receive a tracking number to follow your delivery in real time. You will be notified by email or WhatsApp at each stage of shipment.
delivery.packagingText: All our items are carefully packaged to ensure they arrive in perfect condition. Each Numa package reflects our attention to detail and commitment to quality.
delivery.conclusion: We are committed to making your shopping experience with Numa simple, fast, and secure, from click to delivery.

return.title: Return Policy
return.intro: At Numa, we want you to be fully satisfied with your purchases. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your order, we offer a simple and transparent return policy.
return.condition1: Returns are accepted within 7 days after receiving your order.
return.condition2: Items must be in their original condition, unworn, unwashed, and with all tags attached.
return.condition3: Sale or personalized items are not eligible for return.
return.process2: Provide your order number and the item(s) you wish to return.
return.process3: Carefully pack the items and send them to our address: Abidjan, CÃ´te dâ€™Ivoire.
return.refundText: Once your return is received and inspected, we will notify you by email and process the refund using the same payment method used for purchase. The refund will be completed within 5 to 7 business days.
return.issueText: If you receive a damaged or incorrect item, please contact our customer service immediately so we can resolve the issue quickly at no additional cost.
return.conclusion: At Numa, your satisfaction is our priority. We are committed to making your shopping experience pleasant, safe, and stress-free.
